name: thenable-generator
description: Create generators implemented the PromiseLike interface so that they can be awaited in async contexts.

scripts.build:cjs: tsc --module commonjs --target es2015 --moduleResolution node --outDir cjs --sourceMap --strict --noImplicitThis --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns index.ts
scripts.build:esm: tsc --module esnext --target es2015 --moduleResolution node --outDir esm --sourceMap --strict --noImplicitThis --noImplicitAny --noImplicitReturns --declaration index.ts
scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm

author: A-yon Lee <the@ayon.li>
